Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to improving compliance with the city's pro-voter law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Improving compliance with the city's pro-voter law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to expanding agency based voter registration to additional city agencies.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Expanding agency based voter registration to additional city agencies.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation permitting voter registration forms utilized by agencies participating in the agency assisted voter registration program to code their registration forms, and for such codes to be withheld from public inspection.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Permitting voter registration forms utilized by agencies participating in the agency assisted voter registration program to code their registration forms, and for such codes to be withheld from public inspection.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to improving compliance with the city's pro-voter law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Improving compliance with the city's pro-voter law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to improving compliance with the city's pro-voter law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to improving compliance with the city's pro-voter law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
